text:
Because six-pack mom and model Sarah Stage, 33, worked out H-A-R-D while she was pregnant with her second child, who was born on Monday, she received lots of critique from fans who voiced concerns over her fitness routine and its effects on her baby's health.

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

Still, Sarah assured her followers all along that her doctor approved her for exercise, and her baby was doing F-I-N-E. Yesterday, the mom posted her first family-of-four photo featuring Logan Alexander, her adorable baby boy who came out healthy and weighing 7 pounds, 2 ounces — with a full head of hair to boot.

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

Sarah's first son, James Hunter, who arrived in April 2015, was also born healthy, weighing 8 pounds, 7 ounces. (FWIW, babies who weigh less than 5 pounds 8 ounces are considered low birthweight, as defined by the CDC.)

Although you'd think the model's second successful birth would silence her haters for good, it's (unfortunately) unlikely. After all, after James was born, Sarah got flak for losing all 28 pounds of her baby weight in just two weeks. Sigh. At least Sarah's boys will grow up knowing that their mom is strong AF — with thick skin to boot.

Get all the ~FiTsPiRaTiOn~ directly in your feed. Follow Facebook.com/CosmoBod.

Follow Elizabeth on Instagram and Twitter.
title: The First Photo of Six-Pack Mom Sarah Stage's Newborn Baby Is A-D-O-R-A-B-L-E
